_header: I love unloved I wot not what love may be
_description: An Epistle to his Mistress — 48 lines generally in 8-line stanzas

BodRawC813.First Lines:
I loue on louyd I wotte nott what loue may beconstreynyd I am to
                    loue fethefullye…
BodRawC813.Last Lines:
…goo lyttle byble and neuer restetyll thow cum ther as I loue
                    beste
BodRawC813.Editions:
Padelford,  Frederick Morgan. 
             “Liedersammlungen des xvi. Jahrhunderts…IV.” 
             Anglia
         31 (1908): 309-96: 357-8.
Jansen,  Sharon L.,  and  Kathleen H. Jordan, eds.  
             The Welles Anthology: MS. Rawlinson C.813: A Critical Edition.
         Binghamton, NY: Medieval & Renaissance Texts and Studies,
            1991: 186-8.
